snippet: The fashion-photographer-turned-director Sean Ellis shares beautiful photos from the set of “Anthropoid.”...
abstract: Fashion photographer and director Sean Ellis discusses his latest project, World War II film titled Anthropoid, which stars Cillian Murphy and Jamie Dornan.
lead_paragraph: The fashion-photographer-turned-director Sean Ellis shares beautiful photos from the set of “Anthropoid.”

headline.main: Behind the Scenes of the Season’s Most Stylish Thriller
headline.print_headline: On Screen; He Doesn’t Go Against the Grain
